title: Patch Notes
content: e Idol of Shar. Fixed an issue where Jaheira would stop following the party after spending a night outside of the party. Fixed the rune tablets on the nautiloid sometimes not triggering the Narrator's lines. Clerics of Lathander should now recognise his symbol on a Lathanderian amulet. Ensured the avatar is prioritised as the main speaker in dialogues related to the hag's Act I surrender. Minthara does, in fact, now have something to say about Orin after you kill her.
